snippet.title: [MAME] Tetris Payout (c)1991 BwB / Barcrest - with inputs
snippet.description: Kale added some working inputs to the Tetris Payout and Blox sets.  I'm told protection affects the payout rates still (haven't verified this myself) but you can see how the game roughly plays now.  Appears you have to be fast and get your lines in the 'sweet spot' of the play area to stand any chance of getting even the lowest amount.  I win nothing here.
